body:
I've arrived back from my trip to Florida. :D
It seems like a lot of people are going on vacation. I guess it's summer :P
I hope I didn't miss a lot of stuff. Could I get a recap on stuff that happened on the forums/server? c:
body_tagged:

title: Back from Vacation! :)

replies.body:
yup summer! welcome back!
well, not much happened really..
just I started playing MC on my mom's computer... which is extremely.. "unlaggy" so I'm better now :)
and theres a couple more fun game topics :)

Welcome back 

croc here is wut happened: 


i rejoined FS 


we won 3 games today 5-0 total combined
